%% Makefile Discovery Algorithm %% Shows the sequence of operations for discovering Makefiles and targets sequenceDiagram participant CLI as CLI participant DS as Discovery Service participant FS as File System participant Make as make command CLI->>DS: DiscoverMakefiles(path) rect rgb(240, 248, 255) Note over DS,FS: Step 1: Create temp Makefile DS->>FS: Create temp file with
_list_makefiles target FS-->>DS: temp path end rect rgb(255, 248, 240) Note over DS,Make: Step 2: Execute make DS->>Make: make -f temp -f Makefile
_list_makefiles Make-->>DS: MAKEFILE_LIST output DS->>FS: Delete temp file end rect rgb(240, 255, 240) Note over DS: Step 3: Parse output DS->>DS: Parse file paths
Filter temp file
Resolve to absolute end DS-->>CLI: []string file paths CLI->>DS: DiscoverTargets(path) rect rgb(255, 245, 238) Note over DS,Make: Parse make database DS->>Make: make -p -f Makefile
(with timeout) Make-->>DS: Database output DS->>DS: Extract targets
Parse .PHONY
Parse dependencies end DS-->>CLI: DiscoverTargetsResult

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: CLI、Discovery Service主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: make command、DiscoverMakefiles(path)主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，make command、DiscoverMakefiles(path)的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
我们可以将make -f temp -f Makefile
_list_makefiles分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
让我澄清一下，make -f temp -f Makefile
_list_makefiles的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
让我澄清一下，make -f temp -f Makefile
_list_makefiles的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
我们可以将Delete temp file、Parse file paths
Filter temp file
Resolve to absolute分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
我们应该如何处理DiscoverTargets(path)、make -p -f Makefile
(with timeout)？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
让我澄清一下，DiscoverTargets(path)、make -p -f Makefile
(with timeout)的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
这个系统主要由Extract targets
Parse .PHONY
Parse dependencies组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
明白了，Extract targets
Parse .PHONY
Parse dependencies就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
我的意思是Extract targets
Parse .PHONY
Parse dependencies应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:

Parse .PHONY
Parse dependencies完成整个流程。
